instructions: We place a dinner fork on the table on the bottom left corner
We now place a dinner knife on the on the table with the blade pointing in.
Now we place the salad fork next to the dinner fork with the prongs lined up
Now place your salad for to the left of the dinner fork face the same way
Now place the soup spoon to the right of the salad fork with the bowl facing up
Place a dessert spoon at the top middle of the table with the bowl facing left
Now move the dessert spoon with the bowl facing up next to the soup spoon.
Move the dessert spoon back to its original spot
Now place a dinner plate between the dinner fork and knife
Place a bread plate at the top left of the table touching the dessert spoon.
Place a butter knife on the bread plate
Place a wine glass above the soup spoon
Place a water glass between the wine glass and the dessert spoon
Add a napkin to the food plate
